person.note: Chen(1) Junqing [10884] His Tsin dynasty ancestor moved to Fujian during the troubles of the Yongjia period. During the Five Dynasties, the lineage moved to Putian. Fujian TZ, 149.26b. Yang Wanli, WJ, 123.1a-18a; Zhu Xi, WJ, 96.1a-33b; SYXA, 34.671. CHECK other funerary inscriptions indexed in CBD, 3, 2601-2.From Hartwell's ACTIVITY table:1166: Apt. Tongzhi Shumi yuan shi.1166: Apt. concurrently Canzhi zhengshi.1167: Apt. Canzhi zhengshi.1168: Apt. concurrently Shumi shi1168: Promoted to You pushe (Chief minister).1170: Apt. prefect of Fuzhou.

desc.label: 乾道四年詔舉遺逸 力辭 宰相陳俊卿雅知掞之 招之甚力 乃以布衣入見
樓鑰《攻媿集》卷六五《代通福州陳丞相（俊卿）啟》。
命其菴曰夢蝶軒、曰觀魚臺 曰漉酒 其時陳俊卿王十朋等皆有詠贊 年八十餘卒
